org.rendersnake

Enum DocType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DocType>
      • org.rendersnake.DocType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<DocType>, Renderable

    public enum DocType
extends Enum<DocType>
implements Renderable
    DocType is used to set the doctype of markup language based document such as HTML and XML.
    Author:
    e.micklei
    See Also:
    http://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_DOCTYPE.asp
